programme.desc: Raja Bersiong lari dari istana kerana diburu oleh rakyatnya. Pertemuan dengan Sang Kelembai membuatkan Raja Bersiong bertemu jalan untuk memperbaiki kesilapan dan mengatasi kelemahannya

programme.title: Konfiden Ke Kenal? Ep02
programme.desc: Program yang akan menampilkan pasangan suami isteri yang akan diuji keserasian mereka dengan soalan-soalan berkaitan pasangan mereka.

programme.title: Layan Lockdown Ep02
programme.desc: Pelbagai gelagat dan keletah Ijat, Ryan and Amy menjalani kehidupan norma baharu serta perlu menghadapi cabaran demi kelangsungan hidup yang terjejas semasa pandemik.

programme.title: Jawapan Panas Ep47
programme.desc: Program 30 minit Jawapan Panas bersama dengan ustaz Pu Azman menjawab soalan-soalan dari netizen minggu ini dari episod 46-50 membincangkan tema Sifat Mahmudah

programme.title: Ihsan Kita Ep12
programme.desc: Bagaimanakah golongan miskin bandar cuba untuk meneruskan kehidupan tatkala negara mengalami pembangunan yang pesat?

programme.title: B.O.B. (Bukan Orang Buta)
programme.desc: Seorang pemuzik jalanan (busker) yang berbakat tetapi tidak diberi perhatian orang ramai telah menukar strateginya untuk menyamar sebagai seorang busker buta.

programme.title: Warung Wak 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Saksikan Wak Ropie dalam melayani pelanggan dengan pelbagai topik yang menarik.

programme.title: Roller Kata Ep03
programme.desc: Program yang menguji kemahiran meneka para peserta yang terdiri dari orang awam. Setiap peserta akan dibantu oleh selebriti tetap yang akan menjawab soalan umum sahaja.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep13
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seekor kucing pemalas yang bernama Oggy. Dia suka menghabiskan hari-harinya dengan menonton televisyen dan makan. Tiga ekor lipas kecil, Joey, Marky dan Dee Dee suka menyerang peti sejuk Oggy

programme.title: Putri Untuk Pangeran Ep69
programme.desc: Pelanggan membuat aduan tentang Pangeran kerana dia memberikan pesanan yang salah dan akhirnya bertengkar. . Pengurus restoran menyalahkan Putri dan Pangeran dan memberi mereka satu peluang lagi.

programme.title: Oh My Venus Ep06
programme.desc: Young Ho, Joon Sung, dan Ji Woong hidup sebagai Joo Eun selama sehari untuk meraikan penurunan berat badannya. Soo Jin sedih dengan Woo Shik yang memberi lebih perhatian kepada Joo Eun daripada dia.

programme.title: Awesome Minggu Ini Ep06
programme.desc: Awesome Minggu ini sebuah program yang membawa 7 kisah pendek setiap minggu dan menampilkan seorang artis jemputan wanita yang berlainan setiap minggu.

programme.title: Diva Popular 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Wawa kembali bekerja lepas bercuti sebab mak dia sakit. Wawa memujuk Lola untuk tidak memarahi Ika. Engku Zahran melamar Lola untuk menjadi isteri nombor 3.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri ialah seorang bekas banduan yang mahu memulakan hidup baru dengan anak dan isterinya. Malangnya, Zamri menjadi buruan sebuah kumpulan haram yang diketuai oleh Ramon.

programme.title: Alamak Ep08
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang mempunyai sketsa komedi spontan, nyanyian dan wayang kulit. Hos daripada Tok Dalang wayang kulit di belakang layar. Pemain harus berinteraksi dengan patung wayang kulit.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Bryan Leung stars in this action movie as a former cop turned pet store owner who is unable to lead a peaceful life.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Starring Ti Lung, this seafaring tale of a daring 'Robin Hood' of the deep is directed by the godfather of kung fu films Chang Cheh, Wu Ma and Pao Hsueh-li.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: This three-film anthology collectively offers up a captivating examination of human obsession and love.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: Written and directed by Cheng Kang, this classic film starring Yueh Wah depicts how the Sung Dynasty army's chief instructor is framed by a corrupt minister.

programme.title: The Master of Kung Fu
programme.desc: In this action-packed experimental piece, an all-too-human Huang Fei-hung battles a gangster's plan to frame him for robbery and murder.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Starring Chin Han, Wang Ping and Tsung Hua, this movie revolves around the challenges that beset three sworn brothers and sisters.

programme.title: Disciples of Shaolin
programme.desc: One of Chang Cheh's finest films, this saga stars Alexander Fu Sheng in his greatest martial arts role as a penniless country boy who fights his way to riches.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: 60s pop star Carrie Ku Mei plays pop star 'Little Lark' in her greatest role, in this romance that features some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: This drama depicts the quest of four imperial swordsmen to stop a traitor from staging an invasion of China and taking over the nation.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Sun Chung teams up with real-life kungfu champion Chen Kuan-tai and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-yung to tell the tale of a bandit with a conscience.

programme.title: Lady of Steel
programme.desc: Kung fu queen Cheng Pei-pei plays a swordswoman on a mission to find the bandits who killed her parents and save her country from foreign invaders.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: Jealousy threatens to expose the secret relationship of a 17-year-old student and her 35-year-old teacher husband.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The retired one-armed swordsman made his reappearance to fight against the brutal robbers and protect the peace of the martial art world.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: A clash of cultures and such ensue after Mr. Funny Bone and Big Potato open an old-fashioned healing clinic in ultra-modern Hong Kong.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents this ultimate depiction of dysfunctional kung fu masters, overcoming their shortcomings to win the day, one corpse at a time.

programme.title: Duel of Fist
programme.desc: In this thriller by Chang Cheh, David Chiang and Ti Lung play two skilled boxers, one of whom finds his half brother in the Thai underworld.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a female doctor criticizes a fashion designer's creations, but love follows regardless.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu, who is trying to shed his criminal side, instead finds himself caught up in an all-out gang war that comes to a startling conclusion.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: A poor young woman becomes a popular bargirl in Hong Kong's gritty response to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This drama captures the legend of a young boxer who battles the odds to become the ultimate fighter in a tournament against his greatest rivals.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Featuring the unforgettable song Country Road, Shaw's Huangmei Opera stars Ivy Ling Po and tells the tale of a poor student engaged to a billionaire's daughter.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Various people are out to get the Shadow Whip (an individual, not just a weapon). Starring Cheng Pei Pei and Yueh Hua.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: A singer is blackmailed into committing a heist but when he finds his first love working in the store which he's supposed to rob.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Ling Yun of 'Hellgate' plays a magician-warrior who unwittingly protects a villain from an ambush, until his wife and friend's deaths open his eyes.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: Catch this rare gem, a product of Hong Kong-style science fiction, complete with out-of-this-world visual effects.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: A drifter (David Chiang) and another swordsman (Ti Lung) are competitors for a woman's love who fate turns into brothers in arms.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: This sequel captures how singer Tang Qi searches through battle-scarred China for her soldier lover, Xing Ya. However, are they fated to be apart?

programme.title: As the Light Goes Out
programme.desc: When a liquor warehouse fire threatens to plunge the whole of Hong Kong into darkness upon reaching a nearby power plant, can firefighters avert this disaster?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Due in court as a witness the next morning, Alan still gets raging drunk with friends the night before. Unexpectedly, this twilight haze leads to surprises.

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Since ancient times, the earth has been home to an alien species called Meow. Enter Xi Xili, the latest Meow to visit Earth, who intends to invade the planet when a family takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Young & Fabulous
programme.desc: Starring Quan Yi Feng, Aloysius Pang & Joyce Chu, this coming-of-age story captures the challenges faced by a group of teenage friends on the way to their dreams.

programme.title: The Mafia Lady
programme.desc: A young cop, who vows revenge on his parents' murderer, discovers that one of the key assassins is his sister. How will this affect his vendetta?

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: A middle-aged man grieving the death of his wife attempts to find closure by retracing their journey of love & fulfilling the dream she once had.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: Andy Lau & Huang Xiao Ming embark on a cross-border quest in the quest to protect an incredible new invention from an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: So, I Married My Anti-fan
programme.desc: Starring Korean boy band EXO member Chanyeol & Chinese actress Yuan Shan Shan, this drama depicts how an anti-fan falls for the idol she initially hated.

programme.title: The Sinking City : Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people fight for their ideal lifestyles as they share a small living space called "Space Capsule". Starring Pakho Chao, Louis Cheung & Andrew Lam.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Oscar winner Jean-Jacques Annaud pair up William Chan and Jelly Lin for their first collaboration to tell the story of Genghis Khan, who battles countless hardships en route to becoming the God of War.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai's offering follows five fallen angels who suffer love & loss amidst the crime & chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Eva ends her ten-year relationship with Adam, he's shocked by the seeming suddenness of the break-up till reading her private journal reveals it was the culmination of 77 heartbreaks.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the waning years of the Ming dynasty, a government official is forced to team up with a band of thieves to capture monsters that have escaped from the royal palace.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: Starring Jackie Chan, Show Lo & Nana Ou-yang, this film portrays a hardened special forces agent who fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yuen Qiu, Susan Shaw & Law Kar Ying star in this comedy about Angela, who comes to earth for the first time to look for her brother, who came looking for love. But it is her who finds it in a kind man.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: In a small Chinese village, where an illegal trade in human blood has caused the spread of HIV, two people dying of AIDS risk their all for love & a last chance at happiness.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Chongqing Hot Pot
programme.desc: This action comedy HKIFF 2016 hosts Chen Kun & Bai Bai He in this story of three hot pot restaurant owners who stumble upon a bank vault located in their vicinity.

programme.desc: Thomas and Tom take car hunting to a whole new level by using a plane to 'Air Pick' and search for an elusive Honey hole.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Noah has a new client who wants to take a 1953 Ford F-100 from a farmland hauler to the racer! What starts as a rust bucket truck on its last legs gets an epic overhaul.

programme.title: Garage Squad S2 Ep04
programme.desc: It's crunch time for the crew as they struggle to transform a 1972 Camaro into a wedding dream carriage.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep07
programme.desc: With the drivetrain and suspension done, it's now time to focus on what the Polaris will need to stay safe on the trails.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection S3 Ep07
programme.desc: With the 1950 Mercury successfully chopped, the rest of the work can begin. The MBC team now has to marry the old roof with the new geometry of the newly chopped body.

programme.title: Street Customs S1 Ep01
programme.desc: WCC goes global when it transforms a standard Range Rover into a never-built-before concept car: the Range Stormer - for the Dubai Royal family.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater S1 Ep09
programme.desc: Richard has invited his friends Farmtruck and Azn from 'Street Outlaws' to check out his favorite viral videos.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black S1 Ep06
programme.desc: A running and restored 1962 Corvette gets chopped and dropped as Noah and team set out to retain all the natural beauty of this car.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Ian doesn't want to fix a beat-up Polaris XP 900. He wants to turn it into a completely different rig.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S5 Ep04
programme.desc: Most 1973 AMX Gremlins have some gremlins of their own. The girls get a Gremlin X with an over oiling problem and makes a custom fix to get it back on the road.

programme.title: Street Customs S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Ryan and the WCC crew work the cars for the rich and famous. They reach for the stars and please the wealthy as they transform junk into living jewels.

programme.title: Misfit Garage S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Thomas throws a wrench in the plans and decides to take the car and the Misfits to the Barrett-Jackson all expenses paid.

programme.title: Unique Rides S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Will Castro turns out one-of-a-kind custom autos for a global client base of A-list celebrities, professional athletes, corporate clients and more.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater S1 Ep08
programme.desc: Fails are on the menu for this special Thanksgiving episode. Witness a prank that sends a family's dinner flying. And, in tonight's montage, it's attack of the Turkey!

programme.title: Kindig Customs S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Dave Kindig, owner and operator of Kindig-It Design - Working on all types and periods of cars we'll see cars rendered, designed, built, and restored from the ground up.

programme.title: Aaron Needs a Job S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Aaron joins the the Army Corps of Engineers, who lay massive concrete mats on the Mississippi River.

programme.title: Car Fix S5 Ep04
programme.desc: The Formula Firebird gets a new 5-speed interior to match the new transmission and the Y88 gets a set of new gauges and a custom hood scoop.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S9 Ep08
programme.desc: Wayne discovers a 1947 Alfa Romeo 6C 2500 Super Sport Cabriolet that's been garaged for over 30 years and a fully-loaded, single-owner 1948 Harley Davidson.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers S15 Ep07
programme.desc: Two of the most iconic names in British motoring came together,with an all British engine by Lotus,to make one of the finest British roadsters.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S9 Ep16
programme.desc: Bogi and Faye bring in an Alfa Romeo Giulia to show how you can install performance modifications that help the car go faster and even achieve more fuel efficiency.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Ian needs a new FourWheeler shop truck, but he doesn't just buy new trucks, he builds them.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers S15 Ep03
programme.desc: Mike gets his hands on the Japanese Ferrari, also known as a 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. One small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Joe Martin loves to push the limits. When a customer rolls into the shop with a 1950 Mercury Coupe, Joe Martin knows exactly what he wants to do, chop the top.

programme.title: Kindig Customs S5 Ep02
programme.desc: Dave Kindig, owner and operator of Kindig-It Design - Working on all types and periods of cars we'll see cars rendered, designed, built, and restored from the ground up.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Find out what makes a purpose-built 1972 Chevelle SS 'Pro Touring'. To make this vehicle a modern car, they install a rack and pinion setup with a new steering column.

programme.title: Car Fix S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Jared finds a rare 1971 Formula 455 H/O car and Lou cuts it up. The guys do a 5-speed conversion on this rare bird to make it more fun to drive.

programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep320
programme.desc: When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly north to help free a baby whale that's trapped under the ice.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington invites Mr Curry to stay with the Browns whilst his house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Calvin's remote control car has been turbo charged and is out of control! Can Calvin summon his PLAY POWER before the kid cave is totally destroyed?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep112
programme.desc: ROBO G's robot flock are loose on the dangerous Rock Block Mountain! Calvin launches a Robo Rescue Mission but they keep escaping! Calvin uses his PLAY POWER and calls on a special helper to save them.

programme.title: Ready Set Dance S1 Ep115
programme.desc: A tooting, hooting, back slapping story about a town that's lost a vital move to its hoedown and a Kid Crew member who has to look within, if they're ever going to help find it.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Clues house! While playing 'superheroes' we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep996
programme.desc: It's the Adventure Bay 500! The pups are ready to be the pit crew for their race hero, The Whoosh! When the legendary racer is unable to drive, he calls on Marshall to take the wheel and race in his place!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep104
programme.desc: When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen and buried it! // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse, with a password too!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep401
programme.desc: When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep402
programme.desc: When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep518
programme.desc: Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Hansel and Gretel have to get Bubble Puppy and Bubble Kitty home safe to the Furry Godmother, but they're being stalked by a witch along the way!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep152
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything they say. When Polly flies away, George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep405
programme.desc: At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins for the Supersize Prize Machine. So Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep406
programme.desc: When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep521
programme.desc: Jake's family cuckoo clock is sliding down the mountain with Chickaletta stuck in it! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep523
programme.desc: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits!//Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles around town when a bumpy road shakes them up, causing them to POP.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep102
programme.desc: All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep103
programme.desc: There's mess everywhere at HQ! Luckily ROBO G has created Tidy Bot, a robot that makes tidying into fun games. But a stinky sock makes Tidy Bot malfunction!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Brrrrrrr! HQ is super chilly thanks to ROBO G's new extreme air conditioner. Can Calvin use his PLAY POWER to return the temperatures to normal, or will a wily Yeti spoil his plans?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky and Paddington tries his best to teach him tricks. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington accidentally gets stuck to Mr. Curry! // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy play imaginary games but Meteo thinks they are for little kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When it runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. He makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle to jump in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep205
programme.desc: It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George are called in for their baths before going to bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it's been a long day and they are sleepy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. They get caught in a very long traffic jam so Grandpa Pig decides to bring lunch to them. There's enough for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They find many things. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep501
programme.desc: The Sea Witch steals the Guppies' magical jewels, so she can rule the Seven Seas! Will the Guppies get their jewels back, and stop her before it's too late?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Everyone's in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but what does Blue want to wear? As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!
